<title level="1" right="Hazard 8" pfs="">[Anguished Sarenite](/Hazards.aspx?ID=207)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Haunt" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=88" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #182: Graveclaw](/Sources.aspx?ID=143) pg. 58</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

The gold [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of a former priest of [Sarenrae](/Deities.aspx?ID=16) is haunted by the priest's tormented soul.

---

**Stealth**
DC 26 (expert)

**Disable**
DC 28 [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) to bring the spirit to its senses, or DC 24 [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) (expert) to banish it

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Solar Wrath** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) **Trigger** A non-good creature approaches within 10 feet of the religious symbol; **Effect** The Sarenite summons a burst of spiritual flame in a 30-foot radius. Creatures in the area take 10d8 good damage (DC 26 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will save). Creatures who fail this save are also [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19), and creatures who critically fail are frightened 3 and [fleeing](/Conditions.aspx?ID=17) for 1 round.

---
**Reset**
1 day
